dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to trespass into my domain, mortal?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here seeking information. Can you assist me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Information? Only fools seek answers from the dead.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My intentions are pure, I mean no harm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Pure intentions, yet tainted by ignorance. Leave before I end your fleeting existence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave peacefully, forgive my intrusion.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You have chosen wisely. Depart and do not return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to leave. Face me, wretched creature!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubbornness has consequences. Prepare to face the wrath of the undead.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no fear of the dead. Answer me or face my wrath!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a fragile being. Your wrath shall crumble before mine.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for my disrespect. Please, share your knowledge.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies ring hollow from your lips. Depart before my patience wanes.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you to a battle, bonecaller! Let us settle this.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal, you seek death eagerly. It shall be granted.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see you are powerful. Will you join forces with me against a common enemy?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Alliances with mortals? Unthinkable. Begone before I decide to crush you instead.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense immense power within you. Can we not coexist peacefully?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace is a concept lost on the likes of you. Begone before I decide to make you a permanent resident of my domain.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you a trade of knowledge in exchange for peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge means naught to the dead. Your presence grows tiresome. Leave.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: So be it, bonecaller. Prepare to face my strength!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Strength without wisdom is a deadly combination. Let us see how you fare.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your power is unmatched. Will you not aid me in my quest?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Quests of mortals mean nothing to one who has transcended life. Leave before I decide to extinguish yours.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand. I will depart peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding is rare in your kind. Leave, and do not let your ignorance lead you back here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My quest requires your strength. Will you not lend it to me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Strength without purpose is wasted on the living. Prepare to face the consequences of your ignorance.
